root.Description: social scenario with a bartender and two customers

Dialogues.Utterance: "Mark and Sarah enter the bar and take a seat."
"Mark greets Sarah and asks her what she would like to drink."
"Sarah thanks Mark and begins sipping her wine."
"Mark asks Sarah if she has seen any good TV shows lately."
"Sarah mentions that she has been binge-watching a show on streaming service."
"Mark says he has heard of that show and the two agree to continue the conversation later."
"Sarah brings up a political issue and asks Mark his thoughts."
"Mark disagrees with Sarah's perspective and they begin to debate the issue."
"Sarah and Mark both calm down and agree to disagree after a while."
"Sarah spills wine on her dress and becomes upset."
"Mark notices and offers to help Sarah clean the stain."
"Sarah accepts Mark's offer and the two continue to drink."
"The bartender approaches Mark and Sarah and asks if they want to try a new drink."
"The bartender describes the drink and the ingredients."
"Mark and Sarah both decide to try the drink."
"Sarah asks Mark where he would like to travel."
"Mark mentions his dream destination and asks Sarah the same question."
"Sarah tells Mark about her favorite trip and the discussion continues."
